TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 實作 以便將資訊寫入字串。

span.span: Implements a for writing information to a string.

summary.span: 資訊儲存在基礎 中。

span.span: The information is stored in an underlying .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可讓您同步或非同步方式寫入字串。 enables you to write to a string synchronously or asynchronously. 您可以將字元寫入一次或方法，在階段使用的一個字串或方法。You can write a character at a time with the or the method, a string at a time using the or the method. 此外，您可以在其中寫入字元、 字元陣列或字串，後面接著行結束字元以非同步方式的其中一個方法。In addition, you can write a character, an array of characters or a string followed by the line terminator asynchronously with one of the methods. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |將文字附加至檔案。Append text to a file.|[如何：開啟並附加至記錄檔How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |取得檔案的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |取得檔案屬性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |設定檔案屬性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |判斷檔案是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |讀取二進位檔案。Read from a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |寫入二進位檔案。Write to a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範從一組表示雙倍的句子，然後按一下 轉換的段落建立連續的段落，回到原始的文字。The following code example demonstrates the creation of a continuous paragraph from a group of double-spaced sentences, and then the conversion of the paragraph back to the original text. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CPP/stringrw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CS/stringrw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/VB/stringrw.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉目前 和基礎資料流。

span.span: Closes the current and the underlying stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需建立檔案，並將文字寫入至檔案的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 將文字寫入至檔案](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md). 從檔案讀取文字的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 從檔案讀取文字](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md). 如需讀取和寫入二進位檔案的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 讀取和寫入至新建立的資料檔案](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md). 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 這個實作`Close`呼叫方法並傳遞`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 排清資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Close`. 設定至`true`表示資料會從排清緩衝區資料流，但並不會清除編碼器的狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器，讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊保持其狀態 （部分的字元）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. UTF8，UTF7，其中某些字元可以只編碼編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元後，會影響此案例。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. ## Examples 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分建構函式。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/CPP/strwriter3.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/CS/strwriter3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/VB/strwriter3.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫，請小心不要參考先前處置呼叫中的物件。
can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

The in which the output is written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是必要的標頭必須寫入其中所包含的編碼方式使用一些 XML 案例`StringWriter`。This property is necessary for some XML scenarios where a header must be written containing the encoding used by the `StringWriter`. 這可讓使用任意的 XML 程式碼`StringWriter`並產生正確的 XML 標頭。This allows the XML code to consume an arbitrary `StringWriter` and generate the correct XML header. 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分建構函式。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringWriter1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter1/CPP/strwriter1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringWriter1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter1/CS/strwriter1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringWriter1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter1/VB/strwriter1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 以非同步的方式清除目前寫入器的所有緩衝區，並造成任何緩衝資料都寫入基礎裝置。

span.span: Asynchronously clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

returns.span: 表示非同步排清作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.
